# PY ENCRYPTION 
MARSHAL PY ENCRYPTOR PYTHON3

<h3 align="left">INSTALL :</h3>

````bash
pkg update && upgrade -y
pkg install python -y
pip insta encpy
````

## How to use 

#### Run :

````bash
encpy
````
